room_title: Escape room "The Black Widow" by Escape Quest in Washington, D.C.
review: Went with family and had the best time ever. The Black Widow was a lot of fun. Got out with 11 minutes left. Will do it again.

room_title: Escape room "The Black Widow" by Escape Quest in Washington, D.C.
review: It was so fun and dynamic! We did the Black Widow room and it definitely had elements of suspense and surprise! Loved it!

room_title: Escape room "The Black Widow" by Escape Quest in Washington, D.C.
review: My husband and I did the Black Widow room last night, and it was so much fun! We have both done several rooms before and loved these puzzles! If we come back to town we will certainly be back!

room_title: Escape room "The Black Widow" by Escape Quest in Washington, D.C.
review: What a fun time we had at the EscapeQuest yesterday in the Black Widow room. Our game master, George, was terrific too! Totally fun way to engage one's brain! When we make it back to the city, these guys are totally on our to-do list.

room_title: Escape room "The Black Widow" by Escape Quest in Washington, D.C.
review: My family and I went for a bonding night for my last night in DC. We had an amazing time! The staff was great! Very welcoming and friendly. We did the Black Widow room and got out just in time. The clues were fun and our room helper Jay was hilarious! Definitely added to the fun of the experience! Thanks Jay! The group we went in with was a lot of fun and I would highly suggest this company to anyone looking for a good time if interested in trying an escape room.
